oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Local paper. Pages slightly discolored and stained; covers in deteriorated and frayed condition; first 4 and last 7 folios unumbered.
Mutliple sections bound with two sets of sewing: side-sewn and stab-sewn with cords pierced through and laced into laminated layers forming paper covers; spine rounded and backed.
Written in black ink, 11 lines per pages.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Hindustani and Gujarati in Khojki script.
